Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Highwayman
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A basic infantry fighting vehicle, the Highwayman is the cheapest weaponized option for transporting three people. Hardened against small-arms fire but very vulnerable at the rear, intended to provide mobile fire support for infantry and travel quickly along paved roads.

Similar to other tier 1 vehicles, this is a gas guzzler and best used for medium distances, however itâ€™s also less fuel efficient on the world map.
